Text: Torrent is perfect. Drive has an awesome soundtrack and the quality is great.

Thanks for the torrent. While pretty good over all, there is distortion on Track 7, I Drive, even at very low volumes. Listen to 1:32 onward to understand what I am talking about. I wish I could offer the technical expertise to fix it, but if there is some way this effect can be counteracted through Equalisation or what not, please let me know.
good shit. awesome OST, awesome movie.
